glsa.title: Xdg-Utils: Command injection
glsa.synopsis: A command injection vulnerability in Xdg-Utils may allow for the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Xdg-Utils is a set of tools allowing all applications to easily integrate with the Free Desktop configuration.

description.p: An eval injection vulnerability was discovered in Xdg-Utils.

impact.p: A context-dependent attacker could execute arbitrary code via the URL argument to xdg-open.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Xdg-Utils users should upgrade to the latest version:
